liber.browse.client
Class CustomTabBar

java.lang.Object
  Composite
      liber.browse.client.CustomTabBar

public class CustomTabBar
extends Composite

A horizontal bar of folder-style tabs, most commonly used as part of a com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.TabPanel.

CSS Style Rules

  • .gwt-TabBar { the tab bar itself }
  • .gwt-TabBar .gwt-TabBarFirst { the left edge of the bar }
  • .gwt-TabBar .gwt-TabBarRest { the right edge of the bar }
  • .gwt-TabBar .gwt-TabBarItem { unselected tabs }
  • .gwt-TabBar .gwt-TabBarItem-selected { additional style for selected tabs }

Example

Parameters:

Returns:
true if successful, false if the change is denied by the TabListener.
